attributes.action: Recruitment and finance of police officers nationwide
attributes.additional_details:
We wish petition for and increase of police officers to actively and visibly patrol village and rural locations to reduce the high incidence of crime in these areas.

We also wish to reduce antii-social behaviour, common theft, drug offences and other crimes in areas of urban deprivation by increased police footpatrols and the reintroduction of beat Officers to support taxpayers and residents alike

This will neccesitate the need more finance to provided by central government to maintain the status quo,

Failure to make any effort in any direction to date has meant the withdrawl of front line police officers and a notable  increase of crime in some areas
